column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Was told it would be a 10 minute wait. It took over an hour to be seated. Over priced and not that good. The sangria was good.. And the tapas were good. Although
column2: the mashed potatoes tasted boxed. The paella was not good at all. I got the pork one. Tasted like pork very singular and dry and not flavorful. Very greasy and not good if you get acid reflux. Â I'd rather eat Chinese take out at least it's cheap and would meet my expectations of being bad.
